It's time to enter the manor. We should split up. We'll go over the details in the cave. Got it?

Here's an Earth-shattering K Bomb in case of an emergency. Find the dementalith generator and destroy it.

Any problems, use the bomb. It's the last one though, so use it wisely.

See the cave over there? Head inside.
May the goddess watch over you.

Jelena's plan got you into the manor. While Jelena cleared the way, you killed the vampir duke and duchess, found the device that produced the dementaliths-and blew it to bits.

A Scion priestess, Akia, vowed revenge for your meddling. By the time you killed her pet arachnen, she'd escaped, but you forged a strong friendship with Jelena.

Shhh! They're right up those stairs!

Can you feel that tingling? Right in the back of your neck? That must be magic from their device. Blast, it's strong! We must be quick.

Okay, are you ready?

You'll be making a lot of noise, so I'll disable their alarms, and meet at the ladder to the ground floor.

If anyone—or anything—gives you trouble, cut them down and let the Dream sort it out.

You go crash {@linkcreature:3002#10#Duchess Tirania} and {@linkcreature:3002#13#Duke Volperon}'s little party.

I'll rig the temple door to open when they die. Then we can put an end to this mess.
All right. It's time to take out that device. Hum a song or count as high as you can-anything to keep your mind focused. Just make sure you destroy the target!

Is this the end of Sinestral Manor?

We got rid of the duke and duchess and destroyed the dementalith generator. All in a day's work, eh? Great job in there!
